name: college-employment-survey-v1
description: 大学生就业问卷调查平台 V1 - 基于现代化技术栈的重构版本

scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter frontend test && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter frontend lint:fix && pnpm --filter backend lint:fix
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter frontend type-check && pnpm --filter backend type-check
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && pnpm deploy:frontend && pnpm deploy:backend
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter frontend clean && pnpm --filter backend clean
scripts.db:pre-deploy-check: npm run db:extract && npm run db:validate
scripts.db:post-deploy-validate: npm run db:extract && npm run db:validate
scripts.db:full-sync: npm run db:extract && npm run db:sync && npm run db:generate-data
scripts.data:clean: wrangler d1 execute college-employment-survey --remote --command="DELETE FROM analytics_responses WHERE is_test_data = 1; DELETE FROM universal_questionnaire_responses WHERE response_data LIKE '%test_user_identifier%'; DELETE FROM users WHERE id LIKE 'test_%';" --yes
scripts.data:status: wrangler d1 execute college-employment-survey --remote --command="SELECT 'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users UNION ALL SELECT 'questionnaires', COUNT(*) FROM universal_questionnaire_responses UNION ALL SELECT 'analytics', COUNT(*) FROM analytics_responses;"
scripts.workflow:setup: npm run db:extract && npm run db:sync && npm run db:generate-data
scripts.workflow:deploy: npm run db:pre-deploy-check && npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run db:post-deploy-validate
scripts.workflow:test-data: npm run data:clean && npm run db:generate-data && npm run data:import && npm run data:status

author: V1 Development Team
